pages.title: About Us
pages.content:
Why an SPA?

You can now integrate a woocommerce instance in your existing React App.

Furthermore, there is potential to integrate your store into your React Native iOS/Android app

Why Woocommerce

I wanted a commonly used platform with as much easily/cheaply available API functionality as possible

pages.title: Homepage Content
pages.content:
CMS Content

Hey, it's WordPress CMS page content in the homepage! Use a page component anywhere and include the slug as a "slug" prop

Even though WordPress sanitizes its pages/posts, there is an extra layer of santitation.

Here's an injection , and another one.
